text: Dr Divya Singh deserves kudos for her efficiency & good nature. Overall atmosphere in the clinic is very cordial, friendly & helpful. Besides, ever smiling Ms Vinna at the reception is not only affable but knows her job well. I strongly recommend this dental clinic to all & sundry.
Dr Diviya is highly skilled and takes good care of her patient's dental needs, very thorough and her team follows through very diligently.  Thank you for looking after my teeth with me
